live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
48528.summary: Some customers in the Sargent Park area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48528.title: Apr 10 - Winnipeg (Sargent Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
